data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 169 believers in Nakhchivan, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nakhchivan, Azerbaijan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 169 believers in Nakhchivan that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Nakhchivan, Azerbaijan to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Nakhchivan against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kurd, Kurmanji people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Nakhchivan, Azerbaijan.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 64,800 people living in Nakhchivan.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nakhchivan, Azerbaijan has a population of 64,800.

We estimate Nakhchivan has 169 people who might know Jesus, 1,877 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 62,754 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 383 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Nakhchivan, Azerbaijan that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

location.name: Nakhchivan
